name: lhapdf
description:
LHAPDF is a general purpose C++ interpolator, used for evaluating PDFs
from discretised data files.

dependencies.name: gnuconfig
dependencies.description:
The GNU config.guess and config.sub scripts versioned by timestamp.
This package can be used as a build dependency for autotools packages
that ship a tarball with outdated config.guess and config.sub files.

dependencies.name: autoconf
dependencies.description: Autoconf -- system configuration part of autotools

dependencies.name: automake
dependencies.description: Automake -- make file builder part of autotools

dependencies.name: libtool
dependencies.description: libtool -- library building part of autotools.

dependencies.name: m4
dependencies.description: GNU M4 is an implementation of the traditional Unix macro processor.

dependencies.name: py-cython
dependencies.description: The Cython compiler for writing C extensions for the Python language.

dependencies.name: py-setuptools
dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.

dependent_to.name: herwig3
dependent_to.description: Herwig is a multi-purpose particle physics event generator.

dependent_to.name: sherpa
dependent_to.description:
Sherpa is a Monte Carlo event generator for the Simulation of High-
Energy Reactions of PArticles in lepton-lepton, lepton-photon, photon-
photon, lepton-hadron and hadron-hadron collisions.

dependent_to.name: apfel
dependent_to.description:
APFEL is a library able to perform DGLAP evolution up to NNLO in QCD and
to NLO in QED, both with pole and MSbar masses. The coupled DGLAP
QCD+QED evolution equations are solved in x-space by means of higher
order interpolations and Runge-Kutta techniques.

dependent_to.name: genie
dependent_to.description: Genie is a neutrino Monte Carlo Generator.

dependent_to.name: vbfnlo
dependent_to.description:
VBFNLO is a fully flexible parton level Monte Carlo program for the
simulation of vector boson fusion, double and triple vector boson
production in hadronic collisions at next to leading order in the strong
coupling constant.

dependent_to.name: tauola
dependent_to.description: Tauola is a event generator for tau decays.

dependent_to.name: pythia8
dependent_to.description:
The Pythia program is a standard tool for the generation of events in
high-energy collisions, comprising a coherent set of physics models for
the evolution from a few-body hard process to a complex multiparticle
final state.

dependent_to.name: thepeg
dependent_to.description: Toolkit for High Energy Physics Event Generation

dependent_to.name: syscalc
dependent_to.description: A tool to derive theoretical systematic uncertainties

dependent_to.name: madgraph5amc
dependent_to.description:
MadGraph5_aMC@NLO is a framework that aims at providing all the elements
necessary for SM and BSM phenomenology, such as the computations of
cross sections, the generation of hard events and their matching with
event generators, and the use of a variety of tools relevant to event
manipulation and analysis.

dependent_to.name: superchic
dependent_to.description:
SuperChic is a Fortran based Monte Carlo event generator for exclusive
and photon-initiated production in proton and heavy ion collisions. A
range of Standard Model final states are implemented, in most cases with
spin correlations where relevant, and a fully differential treatment of
the soft survival factor is given. Arbitrary user-defined histograms and
cuts may be made, as well as unweighted events in the HEPEVT, HEPMC and
LHE formats.

dependent_to.name: whizard
dependent_to.description:
WHIZARD is a program system designed for the efficient calculation of
multi-particle scattering cross sections and simulated event samples.

dependent_to.name: dire
dependent_to.description:
DIRE (short for dipole resummation) a C++ program for all-order
radiative corrections to scattering processes in high-energy particle
collisions.
